description.sun-moon:
The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.
The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.
The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.
The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.
description.sword-shield:
The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.
The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user's stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move's power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move's power is 31×.
effect.shortEffect: Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
